qcv1

Class GateFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • qcv1.GateFactory

  • public abstract class GateFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory for generating single qubit gates with the implemented representations
    Author:
    Michael Chiang

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static QGate create(java.lang.String type,
           java.lang.String rep,
           int[] controls,
           int target,
           int numOfStates)
        Create a single qubit gate
        Parameters:
        type - Type of gate (X, Y, Z, H, S, T)
        rep - Gate representation (normal, gate, functional)
        controls - Array of the positions of the control qubits
        target - The position of the qubit that the gate is applied on
        numOfStates - Number of basis states in the register
        Returns:
        A single qubit gate

      • createPhaseGate

        public static QGate createPhaseGate(java.lang.String rep,
                    int[] controls,
                    int target,
                    int numOfStates,
                    double phase)
        Create an arbitrary phase shift gate
        Parameters:
        rep - Gate representation (normal, gate, functional)
        controls - Array of the positions of the control qubits
        target - The position of the qubit that the gate is applied on
        numOfStates - Number of basis states in the register
        phase - Phase shift of the gate
        Returns:
        A phase shift gate with the desired phase
